attributes.action: Where abuse is alleged, financial and children matters linked in  Family Court
attributes.additional_details: The current system allows domestic abuse to continue be perpetuated impacting the mental health of the victims and their children.  Women are being left in thousands of pounds of debt as perpetrators continually take them back to court in order to emotionally abuse them. Using Parental alienation to access the courts when there is clear evidence of abuse and a risk to mother and children
attributes.background: We want parliament to change the law so that perpetrators of domestic abuse cannot use the courts to continue to abuse their victims. We want the secrecy around the family courts to be removed so that women can get the support they need whilst going through the family courts

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the impact of certain family court proceedings, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Family court proceedings to be public: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593754

Give legal rights to be accompanied by family/friends in court: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584534

Make legal aid available to all parents in family court cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581981
